page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN EARDISLEY
page.content: There is a large{garage}in Eardisley which employs 24 workers,who come from Hereford,Talgarth and locally.There are 3 apprentices,training to be mechanics.The garage repairs any vehicle from bikes to articulated and gritter lorries.They go to breakdowns and to recover vehicles.The garage also sells new vehicles many from Japan.There are 10 people in the office. They also sell petrol. In Eardisley there is a small{haulage firm.They carry steel,sand and tarmac. They use Foden lorries.The area they cover includes the Midlands and Wales. None of the lorries go abroad.It is a family business and the firm has been in existence for 60yrs.The first lorry in this area was bought by the present owners father in 1925.They have 7 lorries and employ 6 drivers and 1 fitter.
